attributes.action: Police the age discrimination law in the workplace.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Despite the change in the employment law concerning age discrimination in the workplace, this practice is still rife. Organisations such as Jobcentre plus should be able to report any organisation that rejects applications from the over 40's, and there should be a body that an individual can report their own experiences to.
